short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides daily inspiration, reassurance & comfort by delivering a new ‘It’s okay’ reminder message each time you open your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It’s Okay Tab lists dozens of ‘It’s okay’ messages on rotation with beautiful backdrop images of the most amazing sunrises and sunsets to help instil in you a positive and refreshing state of mind. You also get to see the current time and search the web.

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’ and installing this desktop extension, you are accepting and agreeing to install the extension, and understand that your new tab will be replaced to that provided by the service with Microsoft Bing search results, and the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.

Give yourself permission to be you. To not feel the need to compare yourself to others. Or apologise if you’re having a good or bad ad when others may not be. Because you are great just the way you are.

Privacy Policy: https://freshview.media/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://freshview.media/terms-conditions/
